text: Carole Keeton Strayhorn (born Carole Stewart Keeton; September 13, 1939 - March 26, 2025), formerly known as Carole Keeton McClellan, Carole Keeton Rylander and Carole Keeton Strayhorn, was an American politician. She was the first and so far only woman elected as mayor of Austin. She was elected in 1977 and left office in 1983. Keeton died on March 26, 2025 in Austin, Texas at the age of 85.Former Austin Mayor Carole Keeton dies at 85: 'One tough grandma' ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Mayors of Austin, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Carole Keeton Strayhorn
